content: on the sides of the cover and in the ears i triple tied them to each half_double_crochet you can double knot if you want i just felt better with a triple knot picture c ⓒ 2023 katy s crafting corner | kathryn nelson | all rights reserved front panel color buff cut a 50 strand of yarn and save it for later chain 18 row 1 half_double_crochet in 2nd chain from hook and in each chain across turn chain 1 17 row 2-6 half_double_crochet in each half_double_crochet across turn chain 1 17 we will now create the hole where the tissues come out of row 7-8 half_double_crochet in the next 6 half_double_crochet turn chain 1 6 using the 50 strand slip_stitch in the 12th half_double_crochet from row 6 and half_double_crochet in the same st half_double_crochet in the next 5 half_double_crochet turn chain 1 6 you should now have 2 row of 6 half_double_crochet on both sides of the front panel with a space of 5 in between row 9 6 half_double_crochet chain 5 skip 5 6 half_double_crochet turn chain 1 12 and chain-5 row 10 5 half_double_crochet 6 half_double_crochet in chain-space 6 half_double_crochet turn chain 1 17 row 11-14 17 half_double_crochet turn chain 1 17 row 15 17 half_double_crochet chain 1 rotate panel 17 we are going to work into 3 sides of the front panel to create the sides of the cover we will work 1 single_crochet into each row of half_double_crochet except for the corners row 16 14 single_crochet 2 single_crochet chain 1 single_crochet in 15th row corner 1 rotate and work 16 single_crochet along the bottom of the panel single_crochet chain 1 2 single_crochet in 15th row corner 2 14 single_crochet turn chain 1 50 + 2 chain-space sides if you want a tighter fit only go to round 32 row 17 16 half_double_crochet blo skip chain-space 18 half_double_crochet blo skip chain-space 16 half_double_crochet blo chain 1 turn 50 row 18-32 50 half_double_crochet turn chain 1 50 row 33 50 half_double_crochet fo 50 leave a long tail to attach back panel ⓒ 2023 katy s crafting corner | kathryn nelson | all rights reserved nose chain 7 row 1 half_double_crochet in 2nd chain from hook and in each chain across turn ch1 6 row 2 half_double_crochet increase 4 half_double_crochet half_double_crochet increase turn chain 1 8 row 3 half_double_crochet increase 6 half_double_crochet half_double_crochet increase turn chain 1 10 row 4 10 half_double_crochet turn chain 1 10 row 5 half_double_crochet increase 8 half_double_crochet half_double_crochet increase turn chain 1 12 row 6 half_double_crochet increase 4 half_double_crochet 2 double_crochet *2 4 half_double_crochet half_double_crochet increase turn chain 1 16 row 7 half_double_crochet increase 14 half_double_crochet half_double_crochet increase 18 fo and leave a long tail to sew on to the front panel with a yarn needle i will pull the tail back through the loop under the top of the st to create a curved look like the other side of the nose eyes make 2 make sure to read the notes about
